channel.title: Why!
channel.description:
Okay again.....
im using Hamachi...
im using Pimpscape everything is up but people cant join server, My Port is forwarded I even have it as HTTP and FTP instead of blank Please someone help me...
If you need me MY Hamachi Network is
Dcen and Atl pass is joinus
thank you for your help.

item.title: Why!
item.dc:creator: @Dcen Dcen
item.description:
@Dcen wrote:

nex how would i do that for Window EZ Firewall i did this

idk if it will work thought

I went into firewall and opened zones and added my hamachi server ip to it as a Trusted zone do you think people would be able to connect now?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2007, 07:53:18 AM[/size][hr]okay still no replys can anyone else help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Why!
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

[quote=“Savagedemon, post:2, topic:127792”]Your best bet is to try a different source or maybe people just dont want to come on your server.

I had problems with pimpscape to :mad:[/quote]

Don’t post if you don’t know.

Open Hamachi and put your network online before telling people to enter your server.

Add your port to Windows Firewall exceptions.

Read full topic
